metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11189 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: unrarlib.c in unrar-free 0.0.1 might allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash), which could be relevant if unrarlib is used as library code for a long-running application. NOTE: one of the several test cases in the references may be the same as what was separately reported as CVE-2017-14121.

criterions.comment: unrar-free: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
